questions.question: If you were reincarnated as a piece of furniture, what would you be?
answers: A sassy sofa always judging people's Netflix choices
A haunted wardrobe with a thing for socks
A melodramatic mirror practicing its best 'You Shall Not Pass!'
An overenthusiastic toaster that jumpscares people at breakfast

questions.question: Which of these alternative universe careers sounds appealing?
If your life had background music right now, what would it be?
answers: The dramatic dun-dun-DUN from soap operas
Two goblins arguing over a harmonica

questions.question: What's your strategy during a zombie-apocalypse?
answers: Start a conga line and see if they join in
Host a zombie 'Guess That Brain!' game show

questions.question: If vegetables could talk, which one would be super annoying?
answers: Carrots gossiping about underground dirt drama
Tomatoes constantly having identity crises: 'Am I a fruit?!'
Lettuce just won't stop 'leafing' puns everywhere

questions.question: Which of these odd superpowers do you secretly want?
answers: The ability to telepathically fill any doughnut with mayonnaise
Making people break into spontaneous yodeling
Summoning an orchestra when someone tells a bad joke
Turning traffic lights green by winking at them (only works half the time)

questions.question: You're going undercover in a gang of rogue garden gnomes. What's your alias?
How would you describe your dance style?
You're chosen to represent Earth in an Intergalactic Karaoke Championship. Your song choice?
answers: 'Bohemian Rhapsody' with extra space opera vibes
'I Will Survive' but it's about escaping black holes

questions.question: Your pet rock is sulking again. What did you do this time?
answers: Introduced it to a pebble and asked if they were related
Mistakenly used its cousin in a game of hopscotch
